pages.text: $(bold)When I cook in a wok, the circles that show ingredient doneness don't appear.$()$(br2)This is due to an incompatibility between the Cuisine mod and most shaderpacks.

Workarounds include: $(li)If you wiggle your camera around, the circle may appear hazily at certain angles. $(li)Turning off your shaderpack while you cook ensures that the circles appear correctly. $(li)Try a different shaderpack. I've tested a few popular ones without success, but if you find one that does work then please leave a comment on our Curseforge page!
